questions.question: Guards on bench grinders should cover
The gap between the tool rest and the grindstone on a bench grinder should never be more than
A grinding wheel is classified by
options: The size and type of abrasive and the type of bonding agent.
The size and width of the stone.
The outside diameter and the size of the arbor hole.
The shape and colour of the wheel.
correctAnswer: The size and type of abrasive and the type of bonding agent.

questions.question: A safety specification to consider when selecting a grinding stone or disc is
options: The grit size of the abrasive.
The type of bonding material used.
The rpm rating of the stone or disc.
correctAnswer: The rpm rating of the stone or disc.

questions.question: A dressing tool is used for
options: Putting a fine finish on ground edges.
Squaring the tool rest to the grindstone.
Checking the clearance between the grindstone and the rest.

questions.question: Bouncing or heavy vibration of the workpiece when grinding are indications that the grindstone is
Before installing a new grindstone, you need to
options: Roll it across the floor to check for out-of-round conditions.

questions.question: The risk of the drill bit grabbing the work or breaking
options: Increases as the bit is breaking through the workpiece.
Can be avoided by using adequate lubricant.
Can be minimized by running the drill faster.
Only occurs when drilling hardened steels.
correctAnswer: Increases as the bit is breaking through the workpiece.

questions.question: A V-block should be used when drilling holes in
options: Items where very accurate hole dimensions are needed.

questions.question: Hand drills are rated by the
Tapered shanks are most common on
Slots in the drill press table are provided for
A magnetic base drill press is an advantage when:
options: Holes are drilled in the vertical plane.
The cutting chips need to be recovered.
correctAnswer: Holes are drilled in the vertical plane.

questions.question: The main reason for using templates when forming steel is to
options: Impress your boss with your pattern development skills.

questions.question: One advantage of a vertical band saw is that it
options: Can be used to cut curves.
Provides easy access for blade changes.
Shuts itself off when the cut is completed.
correctAnswer: Can be used to cut curves.

questions.question: Safe cutting of angle iron in a cut-off saw requires
options: A labourer to do the work.
One vertical leg of the angle iron against the stationary block of the clamping device.
One vertical leg of the angle iron against the adjustable block of the clamping device.
Both legs of the angle iron resting on the tool base.
correctAnswer: One vertical leg of the angle iron against the stationary block of the clamping device.
